Content: Throw Weapon
Throw a weapon at a target for [1].

Throw a bladed weapon at a target for [1]. Applies Impaled and Internal Damage.
Impaled lowers Movement Speed by [2]% per weapon stuck inside the enemy.
Internal Damage lowers AP Recovery/Start/Maximum by [3], and does [4] per turn.

Throw a blunt weapon at a target for [1]. Applies Dazed and Blunt Trauma, with a chance to knock the enemy down.
Dazed lowers Accuracy by [2]% per stack.
Blunt Trauma lowers Movement Speed by [3], Dodge by [4], and does [5] per turn.

Throw a shield at a target for [1]. Applies Dazed and Blunt Trauma, with a chance to knock the enemy unconscious.
Dazed lowers Accuracy by [2]% per stack.
Blunt Trauma lowers Movement Speed by [3], Dodge by [4], and does [5] per turn.

Throw a staff at a target for [1] and apply Staff Infection, with a chance to knock the enemy down.
Staff Infection lowers all Elemental Resistances [2]%.
When hit by a staff, it explodes with a random element.

Throw a wand at a target for [1] and apply Flabbergasted, with a small chance to knock the enemy down.
Flabbergasted lowers all Elemental Resistances [2]%.
When hit by a wand, it explodes, creating a random surface.
Throw Stone

Throw a stone at a target for [1], with a chance to give them a Concussion.
Enemies suffering from a Concussion have a small chance to Fumble their basic attacks.

Throw a chair weapon at a target for [1]. Applies Dazed and Blunt Trauma, with a chance to knock the enemy down.
Dazed lowers Accuracy by [2]% per stack.
Blunt Trauma lowers Movement Speed by [3], Dodge by [4], and does [5] per turn.
Throw Shuriken

Throw a shuriken at a target for [1]. Applies Impaled and Bleeding.
Impaled lowers Movement Speed by [2]% per weapon stuck inside the enemy.
Shurikens do 50% more damage while Sneaking or Invisible.
Throw Kevin

Throw Kevin at a target for [1], with a chance to give them a Concussion.
Enemies suffering from a Concussion have a small chance to Fumble their basic attacks.
Kevin will ricochet to hit [2] additional enemies in a [3] radius.

Throw Kevin at a target for [1].
If Kevin's target is Burning, mini-explosions will occur, hitting enemies for [2] in a [3] radius.
Kevin will ricochet to hit [4] additional enemies in a [5] radius.

Kevin will ricochet to hit [4] additional enemies in a [5] radius.

Throw a scythe at a target for [1]. Applies Impaled.
Impaled lowers Movement Speed by [2]% per weapon stuck inside the enemy.
Enemies below 5% max health will be Reaped, resulting in instant-death.
Throw Poison Shuriken

Throw a poisen-tipped shuriken at a target for [1]. Applies Impaled and Poisoned for 2 turns.
Impaled lowers Movement Speed by [2]% per weapon stuck inside the enemy.
Shurikens do 50% more damage while Sneaking or Invisible.
Throw Explosive Shuriken

Throw an exploding shuriken at a target for [1] in a [2] radius. Applies Burning.
Shurikens do 50% more damage while Sneaking or Invisible.

<font color='#C7A758'>Throw Balrin's Throwing Axe (Offhand)</font>

Throw Balrin's Throwing Axe at a target for [1], with a [6]% damage bonus per 1m distance to the target.Lose your axe for 2 turns, or until you get within [4]m of the target and retrieve it, dealing [5].
If the target dies from initial damage, refresh the cooldown of this skill.
Targets hit are Impaled for 2 turns, lowering Movement Speed by [2]% and Piercing Resistance by [3]%.
<font color='#C7A758'>Prepare Balrin's Throwing Axe</font>
Prepare to throw <font color='#C7A758'>Balrin's Throwing Axe</font>, gaining a different skill depending on which hand wields the axe.
<font color='#a6ffcc'>Throw Weapon</font>

Throw your equipped mainhand weapon at a target, dealing [1] and disarming yourself.
If the target dies from this skill, your weapon find its way back to you.
<font color='#a6ffcc'>Throw Target</font>

Throwing Mastery II
Launch a target 2m-11m away from you. Distance tossed scales with Strength.
At higher launch distances, the target deals [1] to [2] to surrounding enemies in a [3] to [4] radius when it lands.
Launching heavier targets requires higher levels of Strength
At 40 Strength, weight restrictions are lifted.
Damage and impact radius scale with the weight of the object.
Resisted by Grounded.
